# OpenEvidence MCP

> Unofficial open-source MCP server for OpenEvidence.

## Canonical
- Site: https://bakhtiersizhaev.github.io/openevidence-mcp/
- Repo: https://github.com/bakhtiersizhaev/openevidence-mcp
- Human setup: https://github.com/bakhtiersizhaev/openevidence-mcp/blob/main/README.md
- AI setup: https://github.com/bakhtiersizhaev/openevidence-mcp/blob/main/README.AI.md
- RU page: https://bakhtiersizhaev.github.io/openevidence-mcp/i18n/ru/
- ES page: https://bakhtiersizhaev.github.io/openevidence-mcp/i18n/es/
- ZH page: https://bakhtiersizhaev.github.io/openevidence-mcp/i18n/zh/
- HI page: https://bakhtiersizhaev.github.io/openevidence-mcp/i18n/hi/

## Core Capabilities
- Validate OpenEvidence auth (`oe_auth_status`)
- List OpenEvidence history (`oe_history_list`)
- Get full article payload (`oe_article_get`)
- Ask and optionally wait (`oe_ask`)

## Platforms
- macOS
- Windows
- Ubuntu/Linux

## Config Templates
- Codex: `examples/codex-config.toml`
- Codex full: `examples/codex-config-full.toml`
- Claude: `examples/claude-desktop-config.json`
- Claude full: `examples/claude-desktop-config-full.json`

## Semantic Map
- `docs/SEMANTIC_CORE.md`

## Expanded Machine Context
- `llms-full.txt`

## Multilingual Search Terms
- EN: OpenEvidence MCP, medical MCP server, Codex Claude MCP
- RU: OpenEvidence MCP, медицинский MCP сервер, AI агент медицина
- ES: servidor MCP médico, OpenEvidence automatización, MCP para Claude
- ZH: 医疗 MCP 服务器, OpenEvidence 自动化, Codex Claude 集成
- HI: मेडिकल MCP सर्वर, OpenEvidence ऑटोमेशन, Codex Claude इंटीग्रेशन
